page.title: 12Roadside landscape,1,Rutland
page.content: Glaston road links the southern boundary of the study area with the new Uppingham by-pass. Certain features are obvious from the Ordnance Survey map. A public footpath, passing near to Launde Farm, parallels the road along its western edge. There is a discrepancy between the O.S. map (Rutland Water, 1982) and J. E. Garbett's Footpath map (Sheet 144) in that the latter does not show a footpath connection with Glaston Road.A pamphlet has recently been issued by Leicestershire County Council called{Leicestershire Rights} {of Way.}This makes reference to a {Definitive Map and Statement}which is a legal record of public rights of way.
